Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 INTRODUCTION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics List of Acronyms and Abbreviations

ODL Onboard Data Loader OFV Out Flow Valve OMS Onboard Maintenance System OMSA Onboard Maintenance Software Application PAC Path Attenuation Compensation PDU Pilot Display Unit PEM Power Environment Module PFCC Primary Flight Control Computers PFD Primary Flight Display PRSOV Pressure Relief and Shut Off Valve PSA Preselect Altitude PSI Pounds per Square Inch PSU Power Supply Unit PTT Push To Talk QAK Quick Access Key RA Resolution Advisory RA MIN Radio Altitude Minimum RAD ALT Radio Altimeter RAT Ram Air Turbine REL Relative RF Radio Frequency RIU Radio Interface Unit RMS Radio Management System RNP Required Navigation Performance RPM Revolutions Per Minute RSP Reversion Switch Panel RTA Receiver/Transmitter Antenna RVR Runway Visual Range SAT Static Air Temperature SATCOM Satellite Communications SELCAL Selective Calling SFIS Standby Flight Instrument System SMS Surface Management System STD Standard SVGS Synthetic Vision Guidance System SVS Synthetic Vision System TA Trafﬁc Advisory TAT Total Air Temperature TAWS Terrain Awareness Warning System TCAS Trafﬁc Alert Collision Avoidance System TCS Touch Control Steering

5th Edition 02 APR 19 1-7
